title:
Your Crime Incident Map- I only see the Wilmington Police Dept reports which includes inside the City limits...can you please include the New Hanover County Sheriffs\' reports also? The rest of us need to know what\'s going on in our neighborhoods too! 

It\'s important for public safety.
text:
The information from the police department comes from the

department's computer records. Currently, similar records from the

sheriff's office are not accessible publicly through the office's

computer system, but the sheriff's office is working on a similar

system that could allow access at some point.
